data.text: Joshua the son of Nave was valiant in the wars,
How great glory got he, when he did lift up his hands,
Who before him has so stood?
Did not the sun go back by his means?
He called upon the most high Lord,
And with hailstones of mighty power
In the time of Moses also he did a work of mercy,
And of six hundred thousand people on foot, they two alone were preserved
The Lord gave strength also unto Caleb,
That all the children of Israel might see
And concerning the judges, every one by name,
Let their bones flourish out of their place,
Samuel, the prophet of the Lord, beloved of his Lord,
By the law of the Lord he judged the congregation,
By his faithfulness he was found a true prophet,
He called upon the mighty Lord,
And the Lord thundered from heaven,
And he destroyed the rulers of the Tyrians,
And before his long sleep he made protestation in the sight of the Lord and his anointed,
And after his death he prophesied,
